meta.title: Users
meta.description: View, edit and manage users belonging to the organization.

role.title: Role Management
role.description: In the field below, you can see and edit which privileges this user has in which modules.

info.title: About Role Editing.
info.desc: You may not have a role to add or remove roles. If you encounter an error when you try to add or remove roles, please contact your organization administrator.

totalRole: There are a total of {{total}} roles.
